content: **about this design** happy wip wednesday this bristol beanie is part of the wip wednesday crochet along with coco crochet lee the crochet along begins on wednesday october 12th and runs to the end of the month there are two sections of the cal the brim and the body of the hat that means that this pattern will initially feature instructions for the brim only and will be updated next week to include the remainder of the instructions you will receive an email notification when the second part of the pattern is released you can join the crochet along by following the link to the free pattern included below you can purchase an inexpensive pdf to support my work read below **about this pattern** crochet your own bristol beanie using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished sizes and measurements are small medium and large 19-20 21-22 22-23 around the brim this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 4 pages including the cover page available as an instant download **questions & returns** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern **please note ** please note that this is an ad-free and specially formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns **you can find the free version here ** https //www cococrochetlee com/wip-wednesday-cal-the-bristol-beanie/ 1 **find me on social media** patterns https //www cococrochetlee com 2 instagram
